mapper.select: WITH ranked_deals AS ( SELECT hi.apt_seq AS aptSeq, hi.apt_nm AS aptNm, hi.latitude AS latitude, hi.longitude AS longitude, hr.deal_space AS dealSpace, CAST(REPLACE(hr.avg_deal_amount, ',', '') AS UNSIGNED) AS avgDealAmount, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY hi.apt_seq ORDER BY CAST(REPLACE(hr.avg_deal_amount, ',', '') AS UNSIGNED) DESC ) AS rnk FROM houseinfos hi JOIN houserecentdeals hr -- 동적으로 매매/전세 테이블 결정 ON hi.apt_seq = hr.apt_seq WHERE hi.latitude BETWEEN #{swLat} AND #{neLat} AND hi.longitude BETWEEN #{swLng} AND #{neLng} AND hr.deal_category = "${dealCategory}" ) SELECT aptSeq, aptNm, latitude, longitude, dealSpace, avgDealAmount FROM ranked_deals WHERE rnk = 1 LIMIT 2000

WITH ranked_monthly_deals AS ( SELECT hi.apt_seq AS aptSeq, hi.apt_nm AS aptNm, hi.latitude AS latitude, hi.longitude AS longitude, hr.deal_space AS dealSpace, CAST(REPLACE(hr.avg_deal_amount, ',', '') AS UNSIGNED) AS avgDealAmount, CAST(REPLACE(hr.avg_fee_amount, ',', '') AS UNSIGNED) AS avgFeeAmount, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY hi.apt_seq ORDER BY CAST(REPLACE(hr.avg_deal_amount, ',', '') AS UNSIGNED) DESC ) AS rnk FROM houseinfos hi JOIN houserecentdeals hr ON hi.apt_seq = hr.apt_seq WHERE hi.latitude BETWEEN #{swLat} AND #{neLat} AND hi.longitude BETWEEN #{swLng} AND #{neLng} AND hr.deal_category = "월세" ) SELECT aptSeq, aptNm, latitude, longitude, dealSpace, avgDealAmount, avgFeeAmount FROM ranked_monthly_deals WHERE rnk = 1 LIMIT 2000
